examples: She won an award for best actress in a leading role.
Many actresses have spoken out about inequality in Hollywood.
Ella ganó un premio por mejor actriz protagonista.
Muchas actrices han hablado sobre la desigualdad en Hollywood.

suggested: Why did the actress refuse to date the dictionary? She found out he had too many definitions of the word 'love'.
Being an actress is like being a chameleon. You have to constantly change who you are to fit the role, and sometimes you forget who you really are.
Why do people assume that actresses are all divas? It's disrespectful and untrue.
Did you know that the first recorded female actress was in ancient Greece in the 5th century BCE?
The smell of the greasepaint and the roar of the crowd. That's what being an actress is all about.
The feel of the stage beneath your feet, and the adrenaline rush of performing in front of a live audience. Nothing compares to it.
As an actress, you have the ability to connect with people on a deep emotional level and bring characters to life in a way that touches their hearts.
